name: RetrieveSitePages
description:
Retrieve Site Page objects from HubSpot CMS.

Use this tool to retrieve specific Site Page objects from HubSpot CMS based on identifiers provided in the request. This is useful for accessing detailed information about multiple site pages in a batch.

parameters.name: page_identifiers
parameters.description: An array of strings, each representing an identifier for a Site Page to be retrieved. Use these IDs to specify which Site Pages to access.

parameters.name: return_deleted_site_pages
parameters.description: Set to true to return deleted Site Pages; false to exclude them.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Site Pages. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Site Pages. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Site Pages. Defaults to `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
